CHAT.comment: child nods his head.
INV and child uncover the starfish tank.
mom gasps.
INV leaves the room.
mom points to something in the starfish tank.
child tries to get off mom's lap and walk away.
mom pulls up a chair.
child and mom laugh.
mom and child utter something unintelligible simultaneously.
INV covers starfish tank.
INV brings in degu.
mom and child speak to degu.
mom utters something unintelligible.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child sticks his finger over the degu cage.
mom whispers something unintelligible.
child speaks to degu.
mom and child talk to degu.
child speaks to degu
child laughs.
mom and child speak to degu.
mom laughs.
mom speaks to degu.
mom and INV speak simultaneously and mom utters something unintelligible.
INV removes degu from the room.
mom and child laugh.
child laughs.
INV comes into the room.
mom laughs.
child examines robodog.
robodog walks up to starfish tank and stops.
child moves robodog away from starfish tank.
child presses button and robodog turns its head back and forth and stretches.
mom and child are silent for a long period of time while robodog walks across the room.
child puts his head down next to robodog and robodog can't get past him.
child is silent and presses buttons on robodog.
INV removes robodog from the room.
child nods his head.
INV and child remove cloth from the computer box.
INV leaves the room.
child examines computer box silently, then bangs on it.
computer box beeps.
mom laughs.
mom points to the sensor on top of the computer box.
mom and child are silent for a while as child touches sensors and makes computer box beep.
child goes to look behind computer box.
mom points to top of computer box
comptuer box beeps.
child plays with the sensor silently for a while.
child gets up and goes over to the door stopper.
child tries to open the door.
child opens door and watches doorknob hit the door stopper.
child closes the door.
INV enters the room.
INV covers computer box.
INV leaves the room.
child moves the meerkat back and forth.
mom pets the tail of the meerkat.
child points to meerkat's mouth.
mom laughs.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child bites the meerkat's nose.
child swings the meerkat around by its tail.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child stands meerkat on its head.
child puts meerkat on his head.
child speaks to meerkat.
child knocks meerkat back onto the table.
child pretends to make meerkat bite him.
child puts the meerkat on his head.
child drops meerkat onto the table.
child swings meerkat back and forth across the table by its arm.
child drops meerkat on the floor.
mom picks up meerkat.
child hugs meerkat and mom laughs.
child pulls the meerkat's tail.
mom laughs.
INV brings in car.
child goes over to car and examines it.
child coughs and puts car on the table.
child rolls car back and forth.
child refers to the piston moving up and down.
child continues to roll car back and forth.
mom takes the car and examines the hood.
mom refers to the piston on the back of the car.
child points to starfish tank.
child turns to look at covered computer box.
child looks at covered starfish tank.
mom redirects the child's attention to the car.
mom flips car over and looks at the bottom.
mom refers to the indentation from the seat of the car.
child points to different places on the car.
child rolls car back and forth roughly on the table.
mom flips car upside-down.
INV removes car from room.
